00021 class CPSDataFormatBehavior extends CPSBaseActiveRecordBehavior
00022 {
00023     //********************************************************************************
00024     //* Member Variables
00025     //********************************************************************************
00026 
00027     /***
00028     * Holds the default/configured formats for use when populating fields
00029     *
00030     * array(
00031     *   'evemt' => array(               //  The event to apply format in
00032     *       'dataType' => <format>      //  The format for the display
00033     *       'method' => <function>      //  The function to call for formatting
00034     *   ),                              //      Send array(object,method) for class methods
00035     *   'evemt' => array(               //  The event to apply format in
00036     *       'dataType' => <format>      //  The format for the display
00037     *       'method' => <function>      //  The function to call for formatting
00038     *   ),                              //      Send array(object,method) for class methods
00039     *   ...
00040     *
00041     * @var array
00042     */
00043     protected $_dateFormat = array(
00044         'afterFind' => array(
00045             'date' => 'm/d/Y',
00046             'datetime' => 'm/d/Y H:i:s',
00047         ),
00048         'afterValidate' => array(
00049             'date' => 'Y-m-d',
00050             'datetime' => 'Y-m-d H:i:s',
00051         ),
00052     );
00053 
00060     protected $_defaultSort;
00061 
00062     //********************************************************************************
00063     //* Property Accessors
00064     //********************************************************************************
00065 
00072     public function getFormat( $which = 'afterFind', $type = 'date' )
00073     {
00074         return CPSHelperBase::nvl( $this->_dateFormat[ $which ][ $type ], 'm/d/Y' );
00075     }
00076 
00084     public function setFormat( $which = 'afterValidate', $type = 'date', $sFormat = 'm/d/Y' )
00085     {
00086         if ( ! isset( $this->_dateFormat[ $which ] ) )
00087             $this->_dateFormat[ $which ] = array();
00088 
00089         $this->_dateFormat[ $which ][ $type ] = $sFormat;
00090     }
00091 
00097     public function getDefaultSort() { return $this->_defaultSort; }
00098 
00104     public function setDefaultSort( $sValue ) { $this->_defaultSort = $sValue; }
00105 
00106     //********************************************************************************
00107     //* Protected Methods
00108     //********************************************************************************
00109 
00119     protected function applyFormat( $column, $value, $which = 'view' )
00120     {
00121         $_result = null;
00122 
00123         //  Apply formats
00124         switch ( $column->dbType )
00125         {
00126             case 'date':
00127             case 'datetime':
00128             case 'timestamp':
00129                 //  Handle blanks
00130                 if ( null != $value && $value != '0000-00-00' && $value != '0000-00-00 00:00:00' )
00131                     $_result = date( $this->getFormat( $which, $column->dbType ), strtotime( $value ) );
00132                 break;
00133 
00134             default:
00135                 $_result = $value;
00136                 break;
00137         }
00138 
00139         return $_result;
00140     }
00141 
00148     protected function handleEvent( $which, CEvent $event )
00149     {
00150         static $_schema;
00151         static $_schemaFor;
00152 
00153         $_model = $event->sender;
00154 
00155         //  Cache for multi event speed
00156         if ( $_schemaFor != get_class( $_model ) )
00157         {
00158             $_schema = $_model->getMetaData()->columns;
00159             $_schemaFor = get_class( $_model );
00160         }
00161 
00162         //  Not for us? Pass it through...
00163         if ( isset( $this->_dateFormat[ $which ] ) )
00164         {
00165             //  Is it safe?
00166             if ( ! $_schema )
00167             {
00168                 $_model->addError( null, 'Cannot read schema for data formatting' );
00169                 return false;
00170             }
00171 
00172             //  Scoot through and update values...
00173             foreach ( $_schema as $_name => $_column )
00174             {
00175                 if ( ! empty( $_name ) && $_model->hasAttribute( $_name ) && isset( $_schema[ $_name ], $this->_dateFormat[ $which ][ $_column->dbType ] ) )
00176                 {
00177                     $_value = $this->applyFormat( $_column, $_model->getAttribute( $_name ), $which );
00178 //                  if ( $_value ) CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Apply format to ' . $_name . ' [' . $_model->{$_name} . ' -> ' . $_value . ']' );
00179                     $_model->setAttribute( $_name, $_value );
00180                 }
00181             }
00182         }
00183 
00184         //  Papa don't preach...
00185         return parent::$which( $event );
00186     }
00187 
00188     //********************************************************************************
00189     //* Event Handlers
00190     //********************************************************************************
00191 
00196     public function beforeValidate( $event )
00197     {
00198         return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00199     }
00200 
00205     public function afterValidate( $event )
00206     {
00207         return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00208     }
00209 
00214     public function beforeFind( $event )
00215     {
00216         //  Is a default sort defined?
00217         if ( $this->_defaultSort )
00218         {
00219             //  Is a sort defined?
00220             $_criteria = $event->sender->getDbCriteria();
00221 
00222             //  No sort? Set the default
00223             if ( ! $_criteria->order )
00224             {
00225                 $event->sender->getDbCriteria()->mergeWith( 
00226                     new CDbCriteria( 
00227                         array( 
00228                             'order' => $this->_defaultSort,
00229                         )
00230                     )
00231                 );
00232             }
00233         }
00234 
00235         return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00236     }
00237 
00242     public function afterFind( $event )
00243     {
00244         return $this->handleEvent( __FUNCTION__, $event );
00245     }
